Uses of Class
uws.service.UWSService

  • Packages that use UWSService 
    Package Description
    tap  
    tap.config  
    tap.resource  
    uws.service.actions  

    • Uses of UWSService in tap

      Methods in tap that return UWSService 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UWSService AbstractTAPFactory.createUWS()
      This implementation just create a UWSService instance.
      abstract UWSService TAPFactory.createUWS()
      Create the object which will manage the asynchronous resource of the TAP service.
      Methods in tap with parameters of type UWSService 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UWSBackupManager AbstractTAPFactory.createUWSBackupManager(UWSService uws)
      This implementation does not provided a backup manager.
      abstract UWSBackupManager TAPFactory.createUWSBackupManager(UWSService uws)
      Create the object which will manage the backup and restoration of all asynchronous jobs.

    • Uses of UWSService in tap.config

      Methods in tap.config with parameters of type UWSService 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UWSBackupManager ConfigurableTAPFactory.createUWSBackupManager(UWSService uws)
      Build an DefaultTAPBackupManager thanks to the backup manager parameters specified in the TAP configuration file (the properties: backup_frequency, backup_by_user).

    • Uses of UWSService in tap.resource

      Fields in tap.resource declared as UWSService 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      UWS service represented by this TAP resource.
      Methods in tap.resource that return UWSService 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UWSService TAP.getUWS()
      Get the UWS service used for the /async service.
      UWSService ASync.getUWS()
      Get the UWS behind this TAP resource.
